alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 27 at 8:26PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A gusty thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Montgomery, Bath, southeastern Fleming and western Rowan Counties through 915 PM EST... At 826 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty thunderstorm near Judy, or 8 miles north of Mount Sterling, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This gusty thunderstorm will be near... Mount Sterling, Sharpsburg and Judy around 835 PM EST. Stoops and Ewington around 840 PM EST. Flat Creek and Bethel around 845 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Reynoldsville, Stepstone, Howards Mill, Peeled Oak, Owingsville, Bourbon Furnace, Kendall Springs, Preston, Odessa, Crooks, Oakley, Craigs, Slate Valley, Wyoming, Marshall, Peasticks, Olympia and Grange City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
